name: Phonebook
about: The app allows user to add name and phone number to the phonebook, search through them, and delete them.
notes: But I also enjoy creating  UI of different styles and colors.

name: To Do List
about: The app allows user to add and delete tasks and lists, mark tasks as important and completed. All data is stored in Local Storage.
notes: You can notice that I love neon colors and dark themes.

name: Monster Project
about: A group project. A tamagotchi-like browser game where a user can feed a pet.
notes: I enjoy playing games myself, and this game I created with my teammates.

name: Music Box
about: An app that uses Genius API to search for songs.
notes: And before that I made another app to search for music (yes, again).

name: Streaming App
about: Work in progress. An app that allows users to login with GitHub account, search for music and play it, and add songs to favourites.
notes: Recently I really got into fullstack development and backend, so I wrote backend for several of my projects and had fun with deploying them on Heroku. I like music, maybe this is why I choose to make a streaming app instead of e-commerce website.
